title: 95/473/EC: Commission Decision of 27 October 1995 establishing the list of approved fish farms in France
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 October 1995  establishing the list of approved fish farms in France (Text with EEA relevance) (95/473/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The fish farms listed in the Annex are recognized as approved farms  situated in a non-approved zone with regard to IHN and VHS.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 October 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
APPROVED FISH FARMS IN FRANCE WITH RESPECT TO IHN AND VHS
1.  Pisciculture de  Sarrance Pyrénées-Atlantiques F-40260 Castets 2.  Pisciculture des Sources Aveyron F-12540 Cornus
